name: Big Turnip
description:
You are a farmer who must defend his biggest turnip from the pest invasion.

It's a defense game where you must kill the waves of creatures coming from the sides to protect your Turnip as long as possible. And to help you, you can collect bonuses between two waves

Control :   
   - Move : < & >
   - Attack and Collect : Space
   - Next Wave : Enter
   - Exit Game : Escape
